title: CBS creating an 'Adderall-fueled, bisexual' dramatic Clueless spin-off centered on Cher's BFF Dionne
text:
CBS TV Studios is reportedly developing an 'Adderall-fueled, bisexual' dramatic Clueless spin-off centered on Cher Horowitz's (Alicia Silverstone) BFF Dionne Davenport (Stacey Dash).

The proposed mystery reimagining of the Beverly Hills teen flick is already 'drawing strong interest from multiple streamers as well as The CW,' according to Deadline.

Executive producers on Clueless include Corinne Brinkerhoff (Jane the Virgin, No Tomorrow), her development exec Tiffany Grant, and Robert Lawrence (who produced the original film).

Sidekick takes centerstage: CBS TV Studios is reportedly developing an 'Adderall-fueled, bisexual' dramatic Clueless spin-off centered on Cher Horowitz's (Alicia Silverstone) BFF Dionne Davenport (Stacey Dash)

Another remake: The proposed mystery reimagining of the Beverly Hills teen flick is allegedly 'drawing strong interest from multiple streamers as well as The CW'

Will & Grace writers Jordan Reddout Wilhoit and Gus Hickey's script is described as 'Mean Girls meets Riverdale meets a Lizzo music video.'

'It's baby pink and bisexual blue-tinted, tiny sunglasses-wearing, oat milk latté and Adderall-fueled look at what happens when the high school queen bee Cher disappears and her lifelong No. 2 Dionne steps into Cher's vacant Air Jordans.

'How does Dionne deal with the pressures of being the new most popular girl in school, while also unraveling the mystery of what happened to her best friend, all in a setting that is uniquely 2020 LA?'

Team: Executive producers on Clueless include Corinne Brinkerhoff (pictured in 2017), her development exec Tiffany Grant, and Robert Lawrence - who produced the original film

Mash-up: Will & Grace writers Jordan Reddout Wilhoit and Gus Hickey's script is described as 'Mean Girls (L) meets Riverdale meets a Lizzo (R) music video'

'What happens when the high school queen bee Cher (M) disappears and her lifelong No. 2 Dionne steps into Cher's vacant Air Jordans. How does Dionne deal?'

Streaming on Amazon! Back in 1995, Amy Heckerling's (2-L) cult classic rom-com, inspired by Jane Austen's 1815 novel Emma, was a sleeper hit earning $56.6M at the box office and scoring 79% on Rotten Tomatoes

Back in 1995, Amy Heckerling's cult classic rom-com (inspired by Jane Austen's 1815 novel Emma) was a sleeper hit earning $56.6M at the box office and scoring 79% on Rotten Tomatoes.

If all goes well, CBS' 2020 reboot will be the second small-screen spin-off after the ABC/UPN sitcom starring much of the old cast, which aired for two seasons spanning 1996-1999.

Last December, Heckerling and Silverstone reunited to catch the Clueless off-Broadway jukebox musical starring Dove Cameron, which closed on January 12 in Manhattan.

Kids in America: If all goes well, CBS' 2020 reboot will be the second small-screen spin-off after the ABC/UPN sitcom starring much of the old cast, which aired for two seasons spanning 1996-1999

Closed on January 12: Last December, Heckerling (L) and Silverstone reunited to catch the Clueless off-Broadway jukebox musical starring Dove Cameron (R) in Manhattan

Ironically, the Dionne spin-off news came two weeks after 52-year-old Stacey was arrested for domestic violence over a September 29 altercation with her husband Jeffrey Marty.

Prosecutors have since dropped all charges against the thrice-divorced mother-of-two, who claimed on October 6 it was simply 'a marital dispute that escalated.'

The former Fox News commentator reportedly met the 'chokeholding' lawyer '10 days before' their 2018 wedding.

Mugshot: The Dionne spin-off news came two weeks after 52-year-old Stacey was arrested for domestic violence over a September 29 altercation with her husband Jeffrey Marty
description: Cher goes missing in the mystery reimagining of the Beverly Hills teen flick
